Title: Relates to requiring contracts for a commercial lease
Summary: Ensures that commercial tenants receive a lease; defines terms within leases; establishes requirements for commercial lease contracts.
LawCode: Add Title 22 Chap 13 §§22-1301 & 22-1302, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring contracts for a commercial lease
